version_description: Brand new interface!
How do you pronounce that word? Now you can listen to each word read out loud!
Adding new apps!
We are sorry to announce that, due to external reasons, we are no longer able to provide mPLUS points. We hope you can continue enjoying this app and stay tuned for new updates coming soon!
New words added!
Fixing reminders for iOS 11
Adding new words!
Listen to every word's pronunciation and favorite them for later!

- Fixed issue with voice volume being too low.
- Refreshed look!

- Check out the new Today extension widget!
- New reminder sounds to choose from
- Send words directly from our new iMessage app!
- Changed the default pronunciation voice
Love the app? Rate us! Your feedback helps us improve.

This is a big update!
- Change the design of the app with themes.
- Browse different categories.
- Choose what type of reminders you want
- Tons of new words added!

- Only interested in learning on the go? Install the new independent watch app.
- Choose your favorite fonts from our new font picker - find it in the theme maker.
- Enjoy a fully redesigned dark mode!
Love the app? Rate us! We read every review.

Fixing bugs, improving performance and adding new themes!
Love the app? Rate us! We read every review.

New features! In this update:
- Add your own words.
- Search words.
- View your previously read words.
- Save your favorite words into your own collections.
Love the app? Rate us! We read every review.

New design, new features and new themes!

- New design!
Do you love the app? Rate us! We read every review.
Need help? Email us! We respond pretty fast.
Privacy and performance improvements.

- Change the voice and pronunciation of the word! You can find this option in the settings menu.
- Change the size of the text, from the theme editor screen!
